metadata.name: Capture Credentials with Rpcping.exe
metadata.comment: Detects using Rpcping.exe to send a RPC test connection to the target server (-s) and force the NTLM hash to be sent in the process.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rpcping.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―s'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—u')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―u'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ntlm'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—t')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―t'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ncacn_np'))))

output.summary: Detects using Rpcping.exe to send a RPC test connection to the target server (-s) and force the NTLM hash to be sent in the process.
